structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Written agreement in deed directing how surface to be reclaimed.
law.text: In any deed in which the minerals are severed from the surface, the present owners of the surface rights may enter into a written agreement directing how the surface shall be reclaimed, and how the property shall be left after the extraction of the minerals, and in compliance with federal and state rules and regulations.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 28, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1984.
